core.module

Class BaseModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.module.BaseModule

  • public abstract class BaseModule
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class to define the extra module api. Each module should implement is own Base class that extend this class.
    Author:
    martino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseModule(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String version, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String mail)
      Define the basic module information in the class constructor
